text: main ( ) { int i , j , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , b [ 1000 ] , max , sum = 0 , n ; int T , k ; scanf ( "%d" , & T ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < T ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { max = a [ i ] [ 0 ] ; for ( j = 0 ; j < i + 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( max < a [ i ] [ j ] ) max = a [ i ] [ j ] ; } sum = sum + max ; } b [ k ] = sum ; sum = 0 ; } printf ( "\n" ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < T ; i ++ ) { b [ i ] = b [ i ] - a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ; printf ( "%d\n" , b [ i ] ) ; } }
